alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus; Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 8:35PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Cabarrus and southwestern Rowan Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 835 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kannapolis, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kannapolis, Concord, Harrisburg, Landis, Enochville, Mt Pleasant, Coddle Creek Reservoir, Charlotte Motor Speedway and China Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
